senses.sense_definition: Any dinosaur of the superfamily Megalosauroidea.

examples.text: The <w>megalosauroid</w> was a large carnivorous dinosaur that roamed the earth during the Jurassic period.
Paleontologists classified the newly found fossil as a primitive <w>megalosauroid</w>.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to, or characteristic of, a megalosaurid or the superfamily Megalosauroidea.

examples.text: Researchers analyzed the <w>megalosauroid</w> features of the jawbone to determine its species.
The museum exhibit focused on <w>megalosauroid</w> evolution and its impact on Jurassic ecosystems.
